Wilmington.Rosemont (Wilmington, Delaware): Rosemont, also known as Joseph W. and Ida Guest House, is a historic home located at 15​1⁄2 Cragmere Road, Wilmington, New Castle County, Delaware. It was built about 1893, and is a ​2 1⁄2-story, three-bay, T-shaped vernacular brick-and-frame farmhouse. It consists of a gambrel-roofed main block with projecting central bay, with a gable-roofed rear wing.
